main

Class ConcentrationSiteProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ConcentrationSiteProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMasterThief, IOrdinaryThief

    public class ConcentrationSiteProxy
extends Object
implements IMasterThief, IOrdinaryThief
    Concentration Site Proxy to make requests to the Concentration Site Server.
    Author:
    Tiago Henriques nmec: 73046; Miguel Oliveira nmec: 72638

    • Method Detail

      • startOperations

        public void startOperations()
        In the Master Thief life cycle, transition between "planning the heist" and "deciding what to do". The Ordinary Thieves are notified of the start of Operations by the Master Thief when all thieves are on the waiting thieves Queue.
        Specified by:
        startOperations in interface IMasterThief

      • amINeeded

        public boolean amINeeded(int thiefId)
        In the Ordinary Thief life cycle, transition between "outside" and "outside". In Ordinary Thief life cycle, transition between "outside" and "outside" The ordinary Thief is added to a waitingThieves Queue and notify the Master Thief The Ordinary Thief has to wait while he is not assembled to a assault party and the results aren't ready.
        Specified by:
        amINeeded in interface IOrdinaryThief
        Parameters:
        thiefId - - Ordinary Thief Identifier
        Returns:
        true if thieves are needed; Return false otherwise. (Thieves are needed while results aren't ready).

      • prepareExcursion

        public void prepareExcursion(int thiefId)
        In the Ordinary Thief life cycle, transition between "outside" and "crawling inwards". The Master Thief is notified when there are enough thieves in order to assemble a assault party. The party is set to ready and the number of thieves waiting to be assembled to a party is set to zero.
        Specified by:
        prepareExcursion in interface IOrdinaryThief
        Parameters:
        thiefId - - Ordinary Thief Identifier

      • prepareAssaultParty

        public void prepareAssaultParty(int partyId)
        In the Master Thief life cycle, transition between "deciding what to do" and "assembling a group". The Ordinary Thieves that are waiting to be set to a party are notified by the Master Thief that now they are assembled to a party and no longer are on the waiting thieves Queue.
        Specified by:
        prepareAssaultParty in interface IMasterThief
        Parameters:
        partyId - - Assault Party Identifier

      • sumUpResults

        public void sumUpResults()
        In the Master Thief life cycle, transition between "deciding what to do" and "presenting the report". The Master Thief notifies the Ordinary Thieves that the results are now ready.
        Specified by:
        sumUpResults in interface IMasterThief

      • getPartyId

        public int getPartyId(int thiefId)
        Method that returns the Assault Party Id of the Ordinary Thief.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        thiefId - - Ordinary Thief Identifier
        Returns:
        the party Id of the Ordinary Thief.
